description:
Anything is the fastest way to build apps. Now, from your iPhone on the go. 

Free to start. Join 1M builders using Anything to launch. 

BUILD APPS WITHOUT CODING

Describe your app. Anything builds it. Mobile apps, web, or both. 

Launch on the App Store or host on the web in 1 tap.

Preview live on your device, then continue editing, exporting or launching from your browser.

SHIPS MOBILE APPS & WEB

- Native iOS mobile apps or web apps
- Live preview on your device
- 1-tap App Store submit (only from web)
- Instant web hosting
- Build from anywhere, sync everywhere (finish later from your browser)
- Export your code (only from web)

DESIGNS THAT POP

- Like you had a designer, not AI
- Dark mode supported by default
- Responsive by default

EVERYTHING BUILT IN

- Add powerful features to your apps in seconds
- AI - ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini (no API keys)
- Payments - In-app payments with RevenueCat, Stripe subscriptions, and more
- Auth - Email, Google, Facebook, X
- Database - Postgres 
- Backend - APIs, uploads, hosting
- 100+ integrations

AI AGENT THAT WORKS FOR YOU

- Thinks through your prompts
- Fixes errors on its own
- Stays reliable as projects scale

Find us on the web: createanything.com 
Follow us on X: https://x.com/anythingai

TestFlight makes it easy to test beta versions of apps and App Clips to provide valuable feedback to developers before they release their apps on the App Store. Developers can invite testers through email or a public link.

When you test a beta app or App Clip, Apple collects and sends crash logs, usage information and any feedback you submit to the developer. The developer may use this information to improve their app and related products. Apple may use crash logs and usage information to improve our products and services.

For instructions on installation, testing and feedback submission, and for details on how your data is handled, see testflight.apple.com.

Rork allows you to build real mobile apps using words. With Rork you can prototype, preview and share real apps right from your phone.

Rork is meant for developers building with Expo Go & React Native, some programming knowledge is recommended.

Run Python code and learn Python on your mobile Device.
Become a Pythonista with this AI powered mobile programming editor.

Python coding on your mobile phone.
You can run, execute, and evaluate Python code, scripts, and programs from this app. 
Python 3 interpreter and compiler on your device.

Write functions, and classes and import modules from the Standard Library.
Run your scripts and programs with a single tap, and see the output in a console window.
Built-in AI Assistance, whenever you get an error in your code, AI can suggest how to resolve it.
AI Assistant can refactor your code, clean it up, check it for bugs, write comments and docstrings or just explain it.

Built in Debugger! Find bugs by stepping through your code line by line.

Lightweight app with full code syntax highlighting, error checking, and code completion, just like a real Python IDE.
This is the perfect app for anyone who wants to learn Python and write Python code.

Elevate your Python skills with built-in coding challenges, solve them to practice and learn Python, and enhance your programming and problem-solving skills. New coding problems are added regularly.

Learn Python with the official tutorial.
Read the official Standard Library documentation from the app.
Learn about data types, functions, classes, and programming constructs.

Edit your code with a full-featured code editor that supports code syntax highlighting, undo and redo, opening files, themes, colors, and fonts.

Test your programming knowledge, the coding editor will tell you if you are writing valid code.

Whether you are a beginner or a professional, this app will help you improve your Python programming skills. Use this coding editor to become a Pythonista and a better developer.

Note that certain features are available only with the developer upgrade.

The Ultimate Mobile Companion for Developers!

Our app revolutionizes the way developers work by bringing the full power of python coding directly to your mobile device. Designed with both seasoned programmers and aspiring coders in mind, our app offers an unparalleled mobile coding experience that is both efficient and accessible, no matter where you are.

Key Features:

- Seamless Execution: Run python scripts effortlessly with our optimized mobile interpreter. Whether you're debugging, learning, or prototyping, our app ensures your code runs smoothly on the go.
- AI Support: Get instant AI-powered assistance to debug your code, troubleshoot errors, and enhance your python skills effortlessly. Whether you're a beginner or an experienced programmer, the AI is here to help you write better code.
- Challenges: Sharpen your python skills with a collection of practical coding challenges, ranging from beginner-friendly tasks to advanced problem-solving exercises. Progress through different difficulty levels and master python coding style step by step.
- User-Friendly Interface: our app boasts an intuitive and clean interface designed for optimal coding efficiency on mobile devices. With customizable themes, fonts, and layouts, you can personalize your coding environment to suit your style.
- Advanced Code Editor: Our advanced code editor features syntax highlighting, code completion, and error detection, making coding on a small screen not just possible, but a pleasure.
- Cloud Sync and Storage: Save your work on the cloud with our integrated storage solutions. Access your python scripts anytime, anywhere, across all your devices.
- Community and Support: Join a growing community of mobile coders. Share tips, solve challenges, and get support from fellow developers. Our app is more than just an app; it's a movement towards mobile programming.

Our app is perfect for professionals looking to stay productive on the move, students learning programming outside the classroom, and anyone interested in data science, machine learning, or just coding for fun. With our app, your mobile device becomes a powerful coding workstation, enabling you to bring your ideas to life wherever you are.

Say goodbye to the constraints of desktop computing and hello to the freedom of mobile development with our app. Download now and start your coding adventure today!

Replit is the best way to create and ship real projects, apps, games, and more right from your phone. With Replit, you can create anything, anywhere. Make apps & sites with natural language prompts. No-code needed

Tell Replit Agent your app or website idea, and it will build it for you automatically. It’s like having an entire team of software engineers on demand, ready to build what you need — all through a simple chat.

Here's what you can do with the Replit app:
• Build websites and apps with natural language using Replit Agent
• Instantly host anything with zero setup deployment
• Create live with others through real-time multiplayer collaboration
• Create in any language and any framework
• Clone and remix projects from over 33 million creators
• Set up custom domains for any of your projects
• Use replAuth to easily configure login for your project's users
• Use ReplDB to quickly spin up databases for any project

Replit is perfect for you whether you're new to creating apps or have been shipping projects for years. If you're a beginner, we have easy-to-use templates so you can learn to create your first dream project. If you're an expert, Replit has advanced features so you can ship real, meaningful projects all from your phone.

With Replit, you can quickly create and collaborate with others. Invite friends to collaborate live on a project together or clone other people's projects to remix their ideas as your own. With millions of templates and projects, you'll have plenty of options to choose from. 

Once you create a project or app, it will be instantly live with custom urls so you can share it with friends. Hosting on Replit is built-in. With zero setup and custom domains, sharing your work with anyone anywhere is easy.

With Replit you can go from creating your first app and sharing projects with the world all from your mobile phone. We're so stoked to see what you build.

TermuxUS - Powerful Terminal Emulator

TermuxUS is a powerful terminal emulator for iOS that provides you with quick and seamless access to your remote servers. Whether you're a developer, system administrator, or just someone who loves to tinker with servers, TermuxUS makes managing your servers and running commands easier than ever.

Key Features:

Quick Connect to Your Server
Access your remote servers with just a tap. TermuxUS makes connecting fast and simple, so you can focus on what matters.

Choose a Theme for Your Terminal and Keyboard
Personalize your terminal experience. Choose from a variety of themes for your terminal window and custom keyboard layouts for your convenience.

Access Support and Manage Settings
Easily manage app settings and access helpful support, ensuring you have everything you need for a smooth experience.

Clear Terminal and Easy Keyboard Control
Navigate your terminal with ease. Enjoy a clean interface and intuitive keyboard controls for more efficient server management.

Custom SSH Keyboard for Quick Server Access
Save time with a custom SSH keyboard tailored to give you quick access to commands and functions, perfect for frequent tasks.

Saved Servers and Folders for Quick Connections
Store and organize your servers and folders for one-click access. No need to re-enter credentials or paths — just connect instantly.

Whether you're managing cloud servers, performing remote development, or simply executing commands, TermuxUS is the essential tool for anyone working with remote systems.

Image Resizer & Compressor is a powerful and user-friendly mobile application designed to simplify the process of resizing and compressing images on the go. Whether you're a professional photographer, social media enthusiast, or simply someone who wants to optimize their image files for various purposes, this app is your go-to solution.

Features:

Image Resizing: Easily resize your images to specific dimensions or choose from various preset sizes suitable for social media platforms like Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and more. Maintain the aspect ratio while resizing to ensure your images look perfect.

Image Compression: Reduce the file size of your images without compromising on quality. The app employs advanced algorithms to compress images while preserving essential details, so you can save storage space on your device or share images faster online.

Video Resizing: Resize videos to specific dimensions and share on different social media platforms.

Video Compressor: Compress videos in bulk and save device space.

Image converter: Change image format easily using this app.

Batch Processing: Save time and effort by resizing and compressing multiple images at once. The app's batch processing feature allows you to apply the same settings to a group of images, making it perfect for handling large photo collections.

Customizable Settings: Tailor the compression level and image size according to your needs. The app offers various compression options, allowing you to strike the right balance between image quality and file size.

Intuitive Interface: The app boasts a user-friendly interface, making it easy for both beginners and professionals to navigate and utilise its powerful features effectively.

Share and Save: After resizing and compressing your images, conveniently save them to your device or share them directly to your favourite social media platforms or messaging apps.

Image Format Support: Image Resizer & Compressor supports various popular image formats, including JPG, PNG, GIF, and more, ensuring compatibility with a wide range of devices and platforms.

Secure and Private: Your images are processed locally on your device, ensuring your privacy and data security. The app does not store or transmit your images to any external servers.

Whether you want to optimize images for online sharing, create stunning social media posts, or manage your photo gallery more efficiently, Image Resizer & Compressor provides a comprehensive solution with its quick and easy image resizing and compression capabilities. Download the app now and take control of your image files with ease!


Our App can be used for free with Ads and limited features, however, you can purchase a Image Resizer Premium subscription for the additional advanced features, and remove Ads.

SUBSCRIPTION AND TERMS:

When you download our App you can opt in to a 3 days free trial for monthly and 7 days free trial for yearly subscription. Our App offers auto-renewing monthly/yearly subscription options for access to the app's features and content. Your Image Resizer Premium subscription will automatically renew at the end of each term and payment will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off auto-renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. To avoid renewal, you must cancel at least 24 hours before your subscription or trial ends. Your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited if you purchase a subscription.

SUBSCRIPTION PRICING:

Premium Monthly: $0.99 / Month (3 days free trial)
Premium Yearly: $5.99 / Year (7 days free trial)

SQL CodePad: The Ultimate SQL Editor and Database Client

Do you want to learn, practice, and master SQL? 
Do you need a powerful, easy-to-use tool to run and edit SQL queries? Do you want to connect to multiple databases and manage your data with a few taps?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, then SQL CodePad is the app for you!

SQL CodePad is a SQL code editor and database client for mobile devices. It allows you to connect to MySQL, Postgres, and SQLite databases, and perform various operations on your data. You can create, modify, and delete tables, views, indexes, and triggers and export your data in JSON or CSV format.

SQL CodePad also helps you write and execute SQL queries with ease. It features code completion, code snippets, syntax highlighting, and error checking. You can run multiple queries at once, and view the results in a table.

SQL CodePad is not only a tool, but also a learning resource. You can practice your SQL skills with the built-in database.

SQL CodePad is the ultimate SQL editor and database client for anyone who wants to learn, practice, and master SQL. Whether you are a beginner, a student, a developer, a data analyst, or a data scientist, SQL CodePad will help you unleash the power of SQL on your mobile device.

Download SQL CodePad today and start your SQL journey!

Note that some features like MySQL and Postgres connections are available only with the Developer upgrade.

Snapt Creative - Dual Camera Capture App

Snapt Creative enables you to capture photos and videos using both your device's front and rear cameras simultaneously. Create unique content with multiple layout options and share your creations with ease.

Dual Camera Capture
Capture photos and record videos using both cameras at the same time. The app utilizes iOS AVFoundation's multi-camera capabilities for smooth, synchronized dual-camera recording.

Multiple Layout Options
Choose from various layout configurations:
Picture-in-Picture (PIP): Position secondary camera in corners (top-left, top-right, bottom-left, bottom-right) or center
Split Screen: Vertical and horizontal split layouts showing both camera views side by side
Photo and Video Modes
Switch between photo and video capture modes. Record synchronized dual-camera videos or capture still images with your preferred layout.

Gallery Management
View all captured works in an organized gallery. Each item shows creation date and layout type. Tap to view full screen, play videos with controls, save to photo library, share, or delete.

Video Playback
Built-in video player with play/pause, seek controls, and progress tracking. Videos display with proper aspect ratio and smooth playback.

Save and Share
Save creations to your photo library with proper permission handling. Share photos and videos using iOS share sheet.

Subscription and Coin System
Free users receive 100 initial coins
Each save (photo or video) consumes 10 coins
Purchase additional coins through in-app purchases
Subscribe for unlimited saves with no coin deduction

User Interface
Clean iOS-style interface with intuitive navigation: Capture, Gallery, and Settings. Smooth animations and responsive interactions.

Privacy and Legal
Comprehensive legal documentation accessible from settings:
Terms of Service
Privacy Policy
Subscription Terms
All documents accessible via in-app web views.


Usage
Launch app and grant camera permissions
Choose layout from menu
Switch between photo/video modes
Capture content
View works in Gallery
Save, share, or manage creations
Note
Requires device with both front and rear cameras. Dual-camera functionality uses iOS native capabilities and performance may vary by device model.

Firelog puts your Firebase projects in your pocket. Browse data, manage users, and review storage from a clean, fast iOS interface—so you can move work forward without opening a laptop.

What you can do

Firestore Editor – Browse collections, query/filter documents, and edit fields with full type support (string, number, boolean, timestamp, etc.).

Authentication Management – Search users, view details, reset passwords, disable or delete accounts.

Cloud Storage – Navigate buckets, inspect metadata, upload new files, and delete unwanted items.

Projects & Accounts – Connect multiple Google accounts and switch quickly between unlimited Firebase projects.

Onboarding & UX – A focused, mobile-first interface built for speed and clarity on iPhone.

Why Firelog
Built by Firebase developers for Firebase developers, Firelog streamlines the routine tasks that slow you down—so you can fix data, manage users, and keep shipping wherever you are.

Notes

Requires a Firebase project and appropriate permissions for each service you access.

Firelog is an independent, unofficial client for Firebase by Google and is not affiliated with or endorsed by Google LLC.

In-App Purchases
Pro features (e.g., advanced filters, bulk actions, and alerting). Pricing may vary by region.

Koder is a code editor for iPad and iPhone. It does have many features including syntax highlighting, snippet manager, tabbed editing, find and replace code, editor theme, remote and local files connections, and many more.
With Koder you can code anytime and anywhere, no matter if you're at your desk or while on the go

Features:

Code editor is optimized text editor focused on coding. It contains necessary features including syntax highlight, code assist, auto-complete, compile and execute, etc.

Features:

- Syntax highlighting for over 110 languages (C++, Java, JavaScript, HTML, Markdown, PHP, Perl, Python, Lua, Dart, etc).
- Include online compiler, can compile and run over 30 common languages (Python, PHP, Java, JS/NodeJS, C/C++, Rust, Pascal, Haskell, Ruby, etc).
- Code assist, folding and auto-completion.
- Easily navigate between multiple tabs.
- Undo and redo changes without limit.
- Search and replace with regular expressions.
- Show or hide line numbers.
- Highlight matching parentheses.
- Automatic indent and outdent.
- Displays invisible characters.
- Open files from recently opened file collections.
- Preview HTML and Markdown files.
- Includes Emmet support for web development.
- Access files from FTP and WebDAV.
- Evaluate JavaScript code with built-in JavaScript console.
- Integrate and easy access to GitHub and GitLab.
- Access files from Google Drive, Dropbox, and OneDrive.
- Dark and light themes and over 30 syntax highlighting styles.

If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please feel free to contact us: support@rhmsoft.com
